title: Humble Bundle
description: Humble Bundle utilizes a distinct shade of red, represented by the hex color code #CB272C, which symbolizes its engaging and passionate approach to digital distribution. This color is recognized across its various platforms and promotional materials, reinforcing its brand identity. References for this branding information are available at http://support.humblebundle.com/hc/en-us/articles/202742060-Bundle-Logos.
